item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: Health & Wellness Consultant Cory Wallack: Strategies and Process for Implementing Integrated and Wholistic Health And Wellness Services
item.description: Friday, June 27, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - In this presentation, Dr. Wallack will review approaches for developing integrated health and wellness services. Throughout the presentation, he will review implementation strategies within the traditional health and wellness offices (i.e., counseling, health, health promotion, recreation) as well as broader campus approaches that can create and sustain a wellness promoting culture.

item.title: Saratoga Jazz Festival | June 289
item.description: Date: Saturday, June 28, 2025 11:00 AM - Join us for the Annual Saratoga Jazz Festival! 2 stages and 22 electrifying artists from jazz to funk, blues, indie, and pop. Kick off summer with good times and good vibes. Enjoy craft beer, tasty eats, a fine arts fair, and much more! Free limited tickets and bus transportation available for Saturday, June 28. Tickets will be available for pick up in the Rensselaer Union Admin Office on June 23rd.

item.title: Lectures on Tap: Optics with Professor Moussa Ngom | June 28
item.description: Date: 6/28/2025 5:30 PM to 7:30 PM Join us for a unique blend of insightful discussion and social fun! Grab a drink, relax, and dive into a lecture with RPI’s own Professor Moussa Ngom, who will deliver an engaging lecture about exciting things his group at the Center for Ultrafast Optical Sciences (CUOS) has learned about the newly emerging field of optical wavefront shaping - the ability to manipulate light fields both spatially and temporally.
